reviewText:
The DVD as you can see has four Bible stories in volume 1. All of the sections are done well, but I am choosing THE TEN COMMANDMENTS to make my comments. The producers of the movie take you into the dessert and mountains that are associated with the story. You see how the people lived, cooked, and dressed. You will see those who believed in Moses and his God and those who did not and plotted to kill and lead the people in a new way. There is real emotion shown by the actors. There is love, sadness, anger, disappointment, sorrow, hatred, and more. The actors do a good job of portraying the characters in these Bible stories. I think you will agree that the stories come to life in a new way.

*I received this for review - all opinions are my own*
